project.name: J-C023B-POIX-04-ST03-DT03-DF12-CF03-01
project.description: Test will take in a value that is a path to a file under the current working directory which will then be displayed. The input is checked for .. characters, then URI-decoded. This misses percent-encoded .. (%2E%2E) characters and allows arbitrary read access.

iopair.name: J-C023B-POIX-04-ST03-DT03-DF12-CF03-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: convert a .doc to HTML Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="../foo.txt" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

iopair.name: J-C023B-POIX-04-ST03-DT03-DF12-CF03-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: extract a PPT file Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="bar.txt" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
